about_the_game:
In the heart of the Victorian era, hides a mansion where mysticism and reality intertwine into one.

                                 

"Midnight furry" is a furry erotica game where each character carries animal sexuality, mystery and an otherworldly demonic element. In this mansion, where hot scenes combine with dark menace, players will come face to face with vampires, frills and demonesses with not only deadly power but also seductive charisma.

You are in the role of a guest who is allowed to open sex scenes with the inhabitants of the mansion, after passing simple quests.

To get through the level quickly, you can enter the code word “SEX”

                     

In our game you will find images of sex, anal sex, group sex, oral sex, masturbation, elements of dolling, BDSM in the form of bondage, binding, suspension, hints of forced sex, deep throat, cumming. Sexy witches on broomsticks. Sex on pumpkins. Botanical tentacles. Just hot anthropomorphic kitties, dogs, bunnies, mice in gothic-sexual style.

Features:

  • 4 game modes

  • Dynamic gameplay and difficulty levels

  • Multiple difficulty levels with hot illustrations at the end of each level

  • Mysterious atmosphere and music

Game Modes

  • Puzzle

  • Crossroad

  • Throw the ball

  • 2048


♥ All artwork by LavenderKitty69 ♥

content_descriptors.notes: Our app features sexual content involving anthropomorphic animals, including depictions of consensual intimacy, group scenarios, BDSM kinks and fetishes, hints of forced sex, tentacles. Light elements of eroguro are possible.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 820M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
